comments.body:
I think in a future PR, we should standardize the "shape" of these files. Think relay-runtime has something similar to this. 

We can leave here for now @alloy and fix in a subsequent PR when i go through relay-runtime.
Can you elaborate/link to an example of what you mean?

Its got to do with that whole `$fragmentRefs`, `$refs` thing. So think once this gets merged, and I go through relay-runtime (much like this pr). Ill get a global picture of how things are meant to hang together and correct it then. For now this was needed to make this clean when authoring.
